TransactionStateContext.BuyTokensState: When users send Ether and the fallback function calls `tokens_buy`.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawState: When the owner withdraws funds from the contract using `withdraw`.

ExternalInteractions.Description: Transfers tokens from the specified address `owner` to `msg.sender` using the `transferFrom` function on the contract `c`.
Transfers a portion of the transaction's Ether to `owner2`.
